Aquarium stock helper

Note: This site is still a work in progress

The biotope and tank size selector are not functional at this moment. Please take these suggestions with a grain of salt! There's also only like 9 fish I've added so far lol. I'm working on adding more, and making this more like a wiki site with info on each fish. Oh yeah and fixing the selectors too. Or maybe I wont. Maybe this website is an art piece, a monument to all the websites and passion projects left abandoned on the hard drives of the middle school computer lab. Who's to say?

Are you just starting out with fishkeeping? Seasoned and looking for inspiration? This is the place for you!

made by flyingfish @ flyingfish.dev
